abstract: Ben Ratliff recalls some performances at Big Ears avant-garde music festival in Knoxville, Tenn.
lead_paragraph: This event in Knoxville, Tenn., included acts as varied as Tanya Gagaq, Rhiannon Giddens and the Kronos Quartet.

headline.main: Big Ears Festival Stars the Avant-Garde
headline.print_headline: A Festival and a Potpourri, Big Ears Lets the Curious Decide

snippet: This event in Knoxville, Tenn., included acts as varied as Tanya Gagaq, Rhiannon Giddens and the Kronos Quartet.
